cars.description: This is an immaculate 2016 Chevrolet Corvette with 0 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 1972 Chevrolet Chevelle with only 15000 miles on original 454 cubic inch motor .
This is an immaculate 1968 Dodge Charger with only 25000 miles on it. Be like Bo and Luke Duke!
This is an immaculate 2015 Porsche 911 GT3 with only 15000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2012 Audi R8 with only 20000 miles on it. V-10.
This is an immaculate 2017 Bugatti Chiron with 0 miles on it. Pinnacle of performance.
